title: Stablecoin Banking Startup Kontigo to Repay Customers After Hack
description: Latin America-focused banking startup Kontigo plans to reimburse more than 1,000 customers after a hack that affected some $340,905 worth of their stablecoins, the company said in an X statement on Monday.
content: Latin America-focused banking startup Kontigo plans to reimburse more than 1,000 customers after a hack that affected some $340,905 worth of their stablecoins, the company said in an X statement on Monday.
